introduction: An enchanting story of faith, redemption, and joy, ANGELITO MIO is the story of a disgruntled angel, Mary of the Stars, who becomes Heaven's unlikely heroine. Heaven is in a state of chaos because God has left on a journey to Earth, seeking to regain his faith in humankind; His regent, San Wichon, has turned the Celestial Senate into an unholy mess! Mary goes in search of her Boss, and embarks on a quest fraught with mystery, excitement, and wonder, as well as no shortage of song and dance, as she endeavors to find God.If heaven's in chaos, who can come to the rescue? When God decides to visit Earth for renewed faith in humanity, San Wichon is left in control of the Celestial Senate and sends the powers that be into disarray. A disillusioned angel, Mary of the Stars, goes in search of her boss and, in the process, uncovers a world of mystery, joy, and wonder she could never have imagined. It's a musical, dancing, emotional treat for the whole family! From the award-winning director of La Bella del Alhambra, Enrique Pineda Barnet. Starring Daniela Jujan, the star of #1 1997 Univision TV soap opera, Luz Clarita.
